mapper.select: SELECT r.re_seq as seq, re_num as user_num, re_subject as subject, re_hashtag as hash_tag, re_hit as hit, date_format(re_date, '%Y-%m-%d') as wdate, datediff(now(), re_date) wgap, re_book_img_url as book_img_url, re_book_title as book_title, user_nickname as user_name, count(c.re_seq) cmt_cnt FROM review_board r LEFT OUTER JOIN user u ON re_num = user_num LEFT OUTER JOIN review_board_comment c ON r.re_seq = c.re_seq WHERE re_num = #{user_num} AND r.re_hashtag like CONCAT(#{hash_tag}, '%') GROUP BY c.re_seq, r.re_seq ORDER BY r.re_date desc, r.re_seq desc LIMIT #{skip}, #{recordPerPage}
SELECT count(*) FROM review_board WHERE re_num = #{user_num} AND re_hashtag like CONCAT(#{hashTag}, '%')

SELECT s.sh_seq as seq, sh_num as user_num, sh_subject as subject, sh_hashtag as hash_tag, sh_hit as hit, date_format(sh_date, '%Y-%m-%d') as wdate, datediff( now(), sh_date ) wgap, user_nickname, count(c.sh_seq) cmt_cnt FROM share_board s LEFT OUTER JOIN user ON sh_num = user_num LEFT OUTER JOIN share_board_comment c ON s.sh_seq = c.sh_seq WHERE sh_num = #{user_num} AND s.sh_hashtag like CONCAT(#{hash_tag}, '%') GROUP BY s.sh_seq, c.sh_seq ORDER BY s.sh_date desc, s.sh_seq desc LIMIT #{skip}, #{recordPerPage}
SELECT count(*) FROM share_board WHERE sh_num = #{user_num} AND sh_hashtag like CONCAT(#{hashTag}, '%')

SELECT al_seq, al_user_num, al_subject, date_format(al_wdate, '%Y년 %m월 %d일' ) as al_wdate, al_imgName, user_nickname as user_name, user_role FROM album_board INNER JOIN user ON al_user_num = user_num WHERE al_user_num = #{al_user_num} ORDER BY al_seq desc LIMIT #{skip}, #{recordPerPage}
SELECT count(*) FROM album_board WHERE al_user_num = #{al_user_num}
